text: Læa cng raluk thung khna thi mu sa di klaw kæ prachachati khxng khea wa xo prachachati khxng chan! Phung raluk thung khwam kruna metta khx ngxallxhˌ thi mi dæ phwk than theid pheraawa phraxngkh di thrng hı mi br rda nbi khun nı hmu phwk than læa di thrng hı phwk than pen ksʹatriy læa di thrng prathan kæ phwk than sing thi midi thrng prathan hı kæ phu dı nı hmu prachachati thanghlay
